featured.text: This eco-friendly leather has clear 24 for the environment, compared to real leather and synthetic leathers.
After years of research and testing, he learned that synthetics worked best and eventually settled on heat-treated nylon, a strong and durable substance.

definition.zh_def: 合成的；人造的，非天然的
definition.en_def: Made by chemical synthesis, especially to imitate a natural product.
definition.example: The synthetic fabric is more durable than natural fibers.
